statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 70;
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature >= 25 OR humidity >= 80;
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 35 AND humidity BETWEEN 60 AND 80;
DELETE FROM temperatures WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND temperature < 20
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND location = 'Living Room'
DELETE FROM temperature_readings WHERE reading_id IN (SELECT reading_id FROM temperature_readings WHERE temperature > 30)
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room A';
DELETE FROM temperature_readings WHERE sensor_id = 'abc123' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM humidity_readings WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT id FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Living Room');
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM temperature_readings);
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room A' AND installation_date < '2022-01-01';
